import { useState, useMemo } from "react" import { useOutletContext } from "react-router-dom" import { Plus, Home as HomeIcon, Calendar, Flame, Circle } from "lucide-react" import TaskModal from "../components/AddTask" const Dashboard = () => { const context = useOutletContext() || { tasks: [], refreshTasks: () => {} } const { tasks = [], refreshTasks } = context const [filter, setFilter] = useState("all") const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const [taskToEdit, setTaskToEdit] = useState(null) // Calculate stats const stats = useMemo(() => ({ total: tasks.length, lowPriority: tasks.filter(t => t.priority?.toLowerCase() === "low").length, mediumPriority: tasks.filter(t => t.priority?.toLowerCase() === "medium").length, highPriority: tasks.filter(t => t.priority?.toLowerCase() === "high").length, completed: tasks.filter(t => t.completed === true).length, }), [tasks]) // Filter tasks const filteredTasks = useMemo(() => { if (filter === "all") return tasks return tasks.filter(task => { switch (filter) { case "high": case "medium": case "low": return task.priority?.toLowerCase() === filter case "completed": return task.completed === true case "pending": return task.completed === false default: return true } }) }, [tasks, filter]) return (
{/* Header */}

Task Dashboard

Manage your tasks efficiently

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.total}
Total Tasks
{stats.completed}
Completed
{stats.highPriority}
High Priority
{stats.total - stats.completed}
Pending
{/* Filter Controls */}
{/* Tasks List */}

{filter === "all" ? "All Tasks" : `${filter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + filter.slice(1)} Tasks`} ({filteredTasks.length})

{filteredTasks.length === 0 ? (

No tasks found

Get started by adding your first task!

) : (
{filteredTasks.map((task) => (

{task.title}

{task.description}

{task.priority || 'low'} priority {task.completed ? 'Completed' : 'Pending'}
))}
)}
) } export default Dashboard
